text: @realDonaldTrump Anyone who thinks O'Biden could run the country better than @realDonaldTrump during the Coronavirus pandemic plus riots and looting - all allegedly caused by @POTUS - should vote for Biden!  But first they should have their heads examined by a certified mental health professional

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
